projects.title: Development of a Capacity Plan and Service Catalog for AUSL Piacenza
projects.description: During the studies at the University of Padua we developed a capacity plan and a service catalog for AUSL Piacenza in the context of the course in administration of IT systems. Together we worked on a business case from this Italian hospital and developed the documents in the Italian language according to ITIL® Service Design.

contributors.headline: Lecturer Software Engineering at Windesheim University of Applied Sciences

projects.title: Groene stad (herontwerp van het Lübeckplein)
projects.description: Voor de ontwerpopdracht van het Honours Programme in Technology and Society van het Windesheim Honours College en Hogeschool Windesheim is een innovatie of product (her)ontworpen. Het ontwerp heeft betrekking op het thema groene stad. Hiermee wordt gedoeld op een omgeving die zijn natuurlijke balans behoudt bij verstedelijking of deze balans herstelt in een al eerder verstedelijkt gebied. Het gaat om de balans op het gebied van (micro)klimaat, milieu, luchtkwaliteit en gezondheid. Specifiek voor onze opdracht is er gekeken naar de invloed die deze balans heeft op de gebruikers. Na dit onderzoek is er een advies opgesteld en een ontwerp ontwikkeld.

profile_positions.description:
Giving lectures and supervising students in the Bachelor's program HBO-ICT. As a teacher I am part of the Software Engineering team.

Courses I am involved in:
 - Programming in C#
 - Server Technology
 - Project Web Development
 - Game Project
profile_positions.title: Lecturer Software Engineering

profile_positions.description: For the graduation project I performed research to propose the design of a tool for improving the implementation of Montessori education at participating schools of the Dutch Montessori Association (NMV). A prototype tool has been developed for this and the findings have been published in a summary publication. This research was carried out for the research group Innovation in Education and was supervised by the senior researcher dr. Symen van der Zee.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Trainee Master Digital Technology (PHP)

profile_positions.description: Performing various supporting tasks in secondary education. Surveillance for tests in final exam classes and upper HAVO/VWO.
profile_positions.title: Teacher Assistant / Invigilator

profile_positions.description: As part of the master Digital Technology, I performed a business analysis with a focus on the Customer Solutions department.
profile_positions.title: Business Analyst

profile_positions.description: Various collaborative projects in the field of research & innovation, in collaboration with the master Digital Technology of Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen. In a team of students I worked on the research and implementation of a number of machine learning algorithms for the virtual fitness coach.
profile_positions.title: Student Research & Innovation

profile_positions.description: Various collaborative projects in the field of research & innovation, in collaboration with the master Digital Technology of Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen.
profile_positions.title: Student Research & Innovation

profile_positions.company: Hanzehogeschool Groningen / Hanze University of Applied Sciences Groningen
profile_positions.description: Thinking and advising on improving and guaranteeing the quality of the master in Digital Technology.
profile_positions.title: Student Member Education Committee of the School of Communication, Media & IT

profile_positions.description: Graduation internship for the Bachelor's degree programme in Software Engineering at Windesheim University of Applied Sciences. During the internship I worked on the 5 professional competencies of the HBO-i foundation. I worked on the development of a system that uses the application of artificial intelligence for improving the indoor climate of commercial buildings. The graduation project was assessed with a 7.0/10.
profile_positions.title: Graduate Trainee Bachelor Software Engineering (Python)

profile_positions.description: Employed at the Research & Development department. We have worked as a team of 6 people to develop an algorithm for optimizing the detection of components in a bin. I mainly occupied myself with research. In researching the possibilities for optimization of the algorithm I have worked a lot with HALCON and C #.
profile_positions.title: Trainee R&D Software Engineer (C#)

profile_positions.description: 11 weeks internship in the context of web development. During the internship I worked on the HBO-i competences at level 2 (analyzing, advising, designing, realizing, managing and professional development). Used tools and technologies included Laravel, MariaDB and GIT.
profile_positions.title: Trainee Web Development (PHP)

volunteer_experiences.description: Bij het initiatief Klets & Koek van Stichting Present heb ik vluchtelingen en asielzoekers in Nederland geholpen om de Nederlandse taal te leren. Dit vond plaats in een informele setting waarbij er ruimte was voor de behoefte van de vluchteling. Met mijn taalkennis van het Russisch en Italiaans heb ik verschillende Oekraïners en Eritreeërs kunnen helpen met het Nederlands.
